summary: This bill, the Dolores River National Conservation Area and Special Management Area Act, establishes a National Conservation Area and a Special Management Area along the Dolores River in Colorado. It aims to protect natural resources, including native fish and recreation opportunities. The bill defines the areas, outlines management plans with stakeholder consultation, and addresses water rights, motorized vehicle use, and access to private land. Notably, it aims to protect existing water rights and tribal rights and sets limitations on water resource projects within the covered land.
